## Job.getDependenciesCount() method

Get children job counts if this job is a parent and has children.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getDependenciesCount(opts?: {
        processed?: boolean;
        unprocessed?: boolean;
    }): Promise<{
        processed?: number;
        unprocessed?: number;
    }>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opts | { processed?: boolean; unprocessed?: boolean; } |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;{ processed?: number; unprocessed?: number; }&gt;

dependencies count separated by processed and unprocessed.
